core

Class Value

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Value

  • public class Value
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to manage many different data type with a single but powerful object
    Author:
    martino

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Value()
      Initialize a value with a void value
      Value(boolean val)
      Initialize a value with a boolean value (it will be converted in Boolean)
      Value(double val)
      Initialize a value with a double value (it will be converted in Double)
      Value(org.w3c.dom.Element e)
      Load a value from an XML element
      Value(int val)
      Initialize a value with an int value (it will be converted in an Integer)
      Value(java.lang.Object obj)
      Initialize the Value from a generic Object
      Value(java.lang.String val, ValueType type)
      Initialize the value parsing a string (with a well-known ValueType)
      Value(ValueDescriptor desc)
      initialize with empty data and only the ValueDescriptor of the future datas
